Package com.bitsavior.entity

Class Bug

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.entity.Entity
com.bitsavior.entity.MovingEntity
com.bitsavior.entity.Bug
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICollision
public class Bug
extends MovingEntity
represents an enemy including A.I is a MovingEntity for the movement behaviour and implements a collision interface
